0 CLEAR500:DIMK(255),T
1 CLS:INPUT"COLOR";C:C=C-1
5 CLS0
10 FORT=1TO64:READA,B:K(A)=B:NEXT
20 PRINT@0,"";:INPUTA,B:IFA=0ORB=0GOTO20
30 FORT=1TO(A/2):A$=A$+CHR$(K(B)+(16*C)):NEXT
40 PRINT@256,A$;
50 GOTO20
1001 DATA128,128
1002 DATA160,129
1003 DATA144,130
1004 DATA176,131
1005 DATA136,132
1006 DATA168,133
1007 DATA152,134
1008 DATA184,135
1009 DATA132,136
1010 DATA164,137
1011 DATA148,138
1012 DATA180,139
1013 DATA140,140
1014 DATA172,141
1015 DATA156,142
1016 DATA188,143
